item.title: 外国基金加入中国牛市，重新爱上 CATL
item.description: 海外投资者周一加入了对当代安培瑞斯科技股份有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.周一，由于对中国遭受重创的可再生能源股的热情重燃，该公司股价大涨超过 14%。【原文：Overseas investors joined the buying frenzy for Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Monday, driving a more than 14% surge in its shares on rekindled excitement over China’s battered renewable stocks.】

item.title: 中国瓶装水巨头农夫山泉因抵制呼声而下跌
item.description: 中国饮料巨头农夫山泉股份有限公司（Nongfu Spring Co., Ltd.）是最新一个受到大陆民族主义网络大军抨击的大品牌，凸显了国内企业在日益爱国的环境中面临的挑战。【原文：Chinese beverage giant Nongfu Spring Co. is the latest major brand to come under fire from the mainland’s online army of nationalist citizens, underscoring challenges for domestic firms navigating an increasingly patriotic environment.】

item.title: 印度今年最大的股票赢家没有分析师报道
item.description: 塔塔集团（Tata Group）旗下一家没有分析师评级、机构投资者持股比例极低的投资公司成为今年印度表现最好的股票，这是当地股票狂热的最新体现。【原文：An investment firm of conglomerate Tata Group with no analyst rating and minuscule ownership by institutional investors has become the top-performing Indian stock this year, the latest showcase of the frenzy in local equities.】

item.title: 通胀降温，阿根廷出人意料地将利率降至 80
item.description: 阿根廷央行出人意料地将基准利率从 100%下调至 80%，因为决策者认为月度通胀降温，同时比索兑美元在平行市场上继续走强。【原文：Argentina’s central bank unexpectedly cut its benchmark interest rate to 80% from 100% as policymakers see monthly inflation cooling while the peso continues to strengthen against the US dollar in parallel markets.】

item.title: KKR 认为现在是进军亚洲信贷市场的好时机
item.description: KKR & Co.称，亚洲信贷市场提供了一些最佳投资机会，因为该地区融资需求强劲，资产价值被低估，发行人质量高。【原文：Asia’s credit markets offer some of the best investment opportunities because of strong demand for financing, undervalued assets and high-quality issuers in the region, according to KKR & Co.】

item.title: 日本电产和 KPS 据称将争夺西门子价值 30 亿欧元的 Innomotics 公司
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，日本电产株式会社和私募股权公司KPS Capital Partners正在竞相收购西门子公司的Innomotics大型电机业务。【原文：Japan’s Nidec Corp. and private equity firm KPS Capital Partners are competing to acquire Siemens AG’s Innomotics large motors business, which could fetch about €3 billion ($3.3 billion) in a sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Blackwells 就 ValueAct 养老金管理角色质询迪士尼
item.description: Blackwells Capital 认为，华特迪士尼公司本应披露 ValueAct Capital Management 正在管理其部分养老基金资产，这激起了两家激进投资公司之间的紧张关系，因为它们在这家娱乐巨头身上追求不同的议程。【原文：Blackwells Capital contends that Walt Disney Co. should have disclosed that ValueAct Capital Management was managing some of its pension fund assets, stirring tensions between the two activist investment firms as they pursue different agendas at the entertainment giant.】

item.title: 中国股票重回全球投资组合的底部赌注
item.description: 在经历了过去一年的多次 "假曙光 "之后，一些投资者看到了中国股市此次反弹可能与众不同的证据。【原文：After multiple false dawns over the past year, some investors are seeing evidence that this rebound in Chinese stocks may be different.】

item.title: 欧佩克（OPEC）月度报告和美国通胀数据公布前，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 在一系列市场报告和美国通胀数据可能为油价指明方向之前，油价在连续三天下跌后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after a three-day drop ahead of a series of market reports and US inflation data that may provide direction for prices.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长亨特称家庭目前 "明显陷入困境
item.description: 储备银行（Reserve Bank）行长助理莎拉-亨特（Sarah Hunter）在董事会召开会议决定利率的一周前表示，澳大利亚家庭目前 "显然在挣扎"，因为他们面临着以通货膨胀为首的一系列不利因素。【原文：Australian households are “clearly struggling” at present as they confront a number of headwinds, led by inflation, Reserve Bank Assistant Governor Sarah Hunter said a week before the board meets to decide on interest rates.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据迫在眉睫，亚洲股市涨跌不一：市场综述
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一，此前华尔街交投谨慎，通胀数据将影响美联储转向宽松货币政策的时机。【原文：Asian stocks were poised for mixed openings on Tuesday after cautious trading on Wall Street ahead of inflation data that’s set to influence the timing of the Federal Reserve’s pivot to monetary easing.】

item.title: 波兰庆祝 80 亿美元美元债券的历史性销售
item.description: 波兰财政部长安杰伊-多曼斯基（Andrzej Domanski）表示，这是波兰有史以来最大的一次美元债券发行。【原文：Poland sold $8 billion in dollar-denominated bonds in what Finance Minister Andrzej Domanski said was the country’s biggest ever debt issue in the US currency.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。华尔街对美股上涨是否还有更远的路要走意见不一。德国计划减少对中国的依赖。阿布扎比看好人工智能。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. Wall Street is at odds on whether rising US stocks have further to go. Germany plans to become less dependent on China. Abu Dhabi is bullish on artificial intelligence. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 美国称前瑞士信贷客户在长达 35 年的税务计划中被捕
item.description: 一名巴西裔美国商人被指控利用瑞士信贷集团、瑞银集团和其他瑞士银行，在 35 年的时间里向美国税务机关隐藏了 2,000 多万美元的资产。【原文：A Brazilian-American businessman was charged with using Credit Suisse Group AG, UBS Group AG and other Swiss banks to hide more than $20 million in assets from US tax authorities over 35 years.】

item.title: 泰森食品公司关闭爱荷华州猪肉工厂，继续进行精简
item.description: 泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods Inc.【原文：Tyson Foods Inc. has decided to permanently shut its pork facility in Perry, Iowa, as the largest meat producer in the US continues to streamline its operations following a plunge in profits.】

item.title: 币安称加密货币产品流入量飙升至历史新高
item.description: 根据 CoinShares International Ltd. 的数据，今年投资者的兴趣浪潮正推动数十亿美元流入加密货币资产，将流入量推向破纪录的水平。【原文：A wave of investor interest is driving billions of dollars into cryptocurrency assets this year, pushing inflows to record-breaking levels, according to CoinShares International Ltd.】

item.title: 花旗称期权交易商的不安情绪更多集中于 CPI 而非美联储
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup）分析师表示，相比美联储下周的利率决定，期权市场更关注周二通胀报告可能引发的 S&P 500 指数大幅波动。【原文：The options market is more concerned about a potentially big S&P 500 move on Tuesday’s inflation report than it is about the Federal Reserve’s interest rate decision next week, Citigroup analysts said.】

item.title: 实现双倍收益的英伟达 ETF 资金流创历史新高
item.description: 随着交易量和资金流入量创下历史新高，人工智能多头越来越青睐一只ETF，该基金加大了对英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Artificial-intelligence bulls are increasingly gravitating toward an ETF that amps up bets on Nvidia Corp. as trading volumes and inflows hit all-time highs.】

item.title: Signa 债权人反对出售奥地利资产的交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，代表 Signa Prime Selection AG 债权人的一个委员会在周一讨论交易的第一次会议后，否决了向 Schoeller 集团出售奥地利房产的提议。【原文：A committee representing Signa Prime Selection AG creditors has rejected a proposed sale of Austrian property to the Schoeller Group following the first meeting to discuss the transaction on Monday, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 卢拉否认巴西国家石油公司的支付希望，称需要投资
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）说，巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）需要牢记巴西人民是其股东，似乎要对令市场哗然的削减股息一事加倍努力。股价扭转了涨势。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said Petrobras needs to be mindful that the Brazilian people are its shareholders, appearing to double down on dividend cuts that have roiled the market. Shares reversed their gains.】

item.title: 美国银行高管在首席执行官削减薪酬后仍获加薪
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）在报告首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）2023 年的薪酬被削减一个月后，披露了两名最高级别高管的加薪幅度超过 10%。【原文：Bank of America Corp. disclosed pay increases of more than 10% for two of its highest-ranking executives a month after reporting that Chief Executive Officer Brian Moynihan’s compensation was cut for 2023.】

item.title: 加拿大海外石油公司在加拿大和美国申请破产
item.description: 加拿大海外石油有限公司已在本国和美国申请破产，并表示打算进行重组。【原文：Canadian Overseas Petroleum Ltd. has filed bankruptcy in its home country and the US and said it intends to restructure.】

item.title: 芝加哥熊队计划耗资 20 亿美元迁回城市体育场
item.description: 芝加哥熊队正采取措施留在这座美国第三大城市，计划出资 20 多亿美元的私人投资来建造一座新球场。【原文：The Chicago Bears are taking steps to stay in the third-largest US city with a plan to contribute more than $2 billion of private investment to build a new stadium.】

item.title: 博鳌亚洲论坛："这轮牛市还有后劲"，没有泡沫形成的迹象
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）认为，几乎没有证据支持华尔街的忧虑者，他们说股市涨得太快太猛，正在接近泡沫区域。【原文：Bank of America Corp. sees little evidence to support the worriers on Wall Street who say the stock market has risen too far, too fast and is approaching bubble territory.】

item.title: 比特币反弹每天创造约 1,500 个 "百万富翁钱包
item.description: 据加密货币分析公司Kaiko Research称，比特币破纪录的涨势似乎每天都在创造约1500个新的 "百万富翁钱包"。【原文：Bitcoin’s record-breaking rally appears to be creating around 1,500 new “millionaire wallets” daily, according to crypto analytics firm Kaiko Research.】

item.title: 媒体买盘反弹，股市的杂志封面魔咒正在发挥作用
item.description: 随着 S&P 500 指数在 2023 年跃升 24% 后，在 2024 年开始时将攀升近 7%，你会认为财经媒体会呼吁谨慎对待股市还能涨多少。但事实并非如此，即使是持怀疑态度的财经出版物也在鼓励投资者买进。【原文：With the S&P 500 Index climbing almost 7% to start 2024 after jumping 24% in 2023, you’d think the financial press would be urging caution about how much further stocks can go. But that’s not happening, as even skeptical financial publications are encouraging investors to buy in.】

item.title: 康托尔起诉前银行家公司，声称数百万利润被盗
item.description: Cantor Fitzgerald LP 起诉了一家由其一批前投资银行家创办的公司，指控他们窃取了价值数百万美元的客户利润。【原文：Cantor Fitzgerald LP sued a firm launched by a group of its former investment bankers, accusing them of stealing clients worth millions of dollars in profit.】

item.title: 欧洲央行倾向于将银行最低准备金水平维持在 1
item.description: 欧洲中央银行倾向于不立即改变贷款人需要无息存放的资金数额，暂时消除了银行盈利能力受到打击的威胁。【原文：The European Central Bank is leaning against any immediate change in the amount of money lenders need to park with it interest-free, removing for now the threat of a hit to bank profitability.】

item.title: 中国从未取消过如此多的美国小麦装运
item.description: 中国又取消了一批美国小麦的出口装运，使芝加哥期货受到拖累的取消装运数量再创新高。【原文：China canceled another batch of US wheat export shipments, adding to an already record number of cancellations that have weighed on Chicago futures.】

item.title: 玻利维亚向华尔街推销与电动汽车电池金属相关的债券
item.description: 玻利维亚财政部长表示，玻利维亚正在权衡今年在纽约出售多达 10 亿美元的所谓绿色债券。【原文：Bolivia is weighing the sale of as much as $1 billion in so-called green bonds in New York this year, according to the country’s finance chief.】
